title: Bed and Breakfast near Sugarbush
name: Bed and Breakfast near Sugarbush
description:
A Map by Tracy_the_astonishing

This map was originally made to help people coming up to a wedding find a place to stay, but since the wedding is over, I've edited the map slightly to be a simple guide to the local bed and breakfasts around Warren, VT and the Sugarbush ski resort.

properties.name: Beaver Pond Farm (70)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 1225 Golf Course Rd, Warren, Vermont 05674802 583.2861 Innkeeper@BeaverPondFarmInn.com Nancy and Bob Baron, Owner/Innkeepers Three-night minimum Columbus Day weekend. We are open to accepting one or more well mannered children at the Inn, depending on the season and circumstance. Please call to discuss your situation. We do require that children keep an eye on their parents at all times. If you require a crib, we can arrange one for a flat fee of 5. No pets Check availability The four tastefully decorated guest rooms in our Vermont Bed and Breakfast are furnished with period antiques, reproduction furniture and oriental rugs. Our luxurious queen and king-size beds are appointed with fine linens and fluffy down comforters, assuring a restful night’s sleep. All Bed & Breakfast rooms have en suite bathrooms, blow dryers, high-speed DSL Internet access, clock radio/CD players and comfy spa robes. Televisions and DVD players are available upon request free of charge.

properties.name: Bridges Family Resort (50-85)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing    202 Bridges Circle, warren, VTTwo-night minimum Kid-friendly No pets Check availability The valleys most unique getaway option 1-3 bedroom condominium resort featuring on-site recreation center that offers an indoor pool outdoor hot tub complete fitness center 2 indoor har-tru tennis courts saunas game room and lounge. located 1/3 mile from sugarbush and only 7 miles to mad river glen. complimentary shuttle. also ranked among the top 50 u.s. tennis resorts by tennis magazine. year-round tennis instruction available upon request. there is so much to do under one roof you may never want to leave. Amenities: * Babysitting/Child Services * Free Transportation * Meeting/Banquet Facilities * Outdoor Pool * Tennis * Family Plan * No Smoking Rooms/Facilities * Phone Service * Parking * FAX * Lounge * Pool * Restaurant

properties.name: Buffalo Bill's Retreat (74/studio-55/5 br chalet)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 64 Wildfire Dr, Warren, VTCall toll-free at (866) 434-3292 Locally at (802) 496-6942 This hotel has the most exciting name. Buffalo Bills offers 4-5 bedroom chalets and studios. It could be interesting to get several couples together to share a chalet for the night. It runs 55/night for 5 bedrooms, 95 for four bedrooms, and 74 for a studio. from the website: Come stay with us at Buffalo Bill’s Retreat located in the scenic Mad River Valley, home to Sugarbush Resort and Mad River Glen Ski Area. Our properties are adjacent to Sugarbush’s Lincoln Peak, with breathtaking mountain views and peaceful wooded surroundings. Buffalo Bill’s offers comfortable and cozy rental properties, perfect for ski vacations, family gatherings, wedding parties and special occasions. Located only one minute from the trails at Lincoln Peak and Sugarbush’s Robert Trent Jones, Sr. golf course, our vacation properties provide easy access to the great outdoors of Sugarbush Resort and the Mad River Valley. While conveniently located, we are also able to provide quiet relaxation with each of our units being fully furnished and equipped with woodstoves, spatial decks and outdoor hot tubs. All of our units come with linens, towels and all of the amenities of home, you just need to arrive with whatever food and libations you desire! So, if you are a group of two to twelve or more, give us a call or e-mail today for all your seasons’ getaways at Buffalo Bill’s Retreat.

properties.name: Deer Meadow Inn (50)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 3215 Airport Road, warren, vt(888) 459-9183 majorell@accessvt.com Three-night minimum Columbus Day weekend. Check availability Welcome to 35 acres of vermont paradise which abounds in nature\'s wildlife. The Deer Meadow Inn is nestled in a picturesque setting of large grounds, two spring fed stocked ponds and the backdrop of the green mountains. fly fish or ski in the beauty of your surroundings and relax in comfort by the ponds in the summer or the fireplace in the winter. you have a choice of three spacious guest rooms filled with antiques and each with views. Gracious hospitality and delicious morning breakfast will prepare you for the excitement of each new day. We are in the heart of ski country during the winter and spectacular mountain beauty in the summer and fall. We are a non-smoking inn. Amenities: * Bath Tub * Free Parking * Health Club * Indoor Pool * Skiing * Television with Cable * Connecting Rooms * Golf * Jogging Track * Outdoor Pool * Fitness Center or Spa * Tennis * Live Entertainment * No Smoking Rooms/Facilities * Pool * Parking * TV

properties.name: Egan's Big World Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 8 VT Route 17, Waitsfield, VTThis is a gigantic and very family-friendly place to have a meal.

properties.name: Hyde Away (9 shared bath-50)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing    1428 Millbrook Rd, Waitsfield, VTThere are only ten rooms, so check availability. Call 800-777-HYDE for reservations and information or email us at hydeaway@madriver.com. Amenities include: wifi, restaurant, large range of rooms, pet friendly, common area with TV and books and toys, kid-friendly. No telephones in any of the rooms. Price range 9 (shared bath)-50 The website of this place makes it look like a super-friendly, homey, family-style place. They even have a picture of their baby on the front page of the site. "The Hyde Away Inn and Restaurant is a farmstead, circa 1824, located in the Mad River Valley in the heart of Vermont\'s Green Mountains. Nestled between the quaint, historic villages of Waitsfield and Warren, the inn is a comfortable haven with friendly people, good food and a casual atmosphere."

properties.name: Lareau Farm Country Inn (0-25)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 48 Lareau Rd waitsfield, VT(802) 496-4949 play@lareaufarminn.com Children of all ages accepted No minimum stay Pets negotiable Check availability from the website: The Inn at Lareau Farm is a classic Vermont farmhouse nestled on the banks of the Mad River. Our twelve comfortable guest rooms are each individually decorated with a collection of country antiques and hand-made quilts. Included with the room pricing is a scrumptious home-made breakfast and warm cookies every afternoon. We specialize in offering family hospitality and gracious service. Lareau Farm also is home to American Flatbread. "Pizza is pizza, Flatbread is heaven." We delight in offering fun family reunions, intimate corporate getaways, and of course country elegant weddings. Come to the Mad River Valley to entertain the soul, enlighten the mind, an energize the spirit.

properties.name: Mad River Inn (30-60)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  243 Tremblay Rd Waitsfield, VT 05673Three-night minimum stay Columbus Day weekend. Children 5 and over are welcome. Check availability 1860\'s Country Victorian charm with picturesque mountain views & distant barns. 10 romantic guestrooms with featherbeds & private baths. Elegant living room with library, fireplace &comfortable couches. BYOB lounge with wood stove, TV, VCR, billiard table. Gazebo & outdoor Jacuzzi. Spacious for groups and reunions. Next to recreation path along Mad river. Exceptional midweek specials. Affiliated with the Vermont Icelandic horse farm. Tremblay Road, just off scenic Route 100 Waitsfield, Vermont (802) 496-7900 1-800-832-8278 madinn@madriver.com

properties.name: Millbrook Inn (50)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 533 Mill Brook Road, Waitsfield, VT(800) 477-2809 gorman@millbrookinn.com Three-night minimum Columbus Day weekend. Pets accepted. Check availability Millbrook Country Inn & Restaurant is a classic cape-style farm house built by Jack Dana in the 1850\'s. He located his farmhouse close to his lumber and brick mills on the nearby Mill Brook. Today the mills are long gone and Millbrook Inn\'s picturesque setting is midway between the ski slopes and the village of Waitsfield on scenic Mill Brook Road (Route 17). Henry & Ginny Perkins purchased Millbrook Country Inn in 1948 from Jack Dana\'s estate and turned it into a bed and breakfast inn the same year that skiers first schussed the slopes of Mad River Glen. Since 1979, Joan & Thom Gorman have maintained the renowned Vermont innkeeping tradition of personalized service in a friendly, unhurried atmosphere.

properties.name: Powderhound (09)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  203 Powderhorn Rd, warren, VtToll-free 800-548-4022 Pets ok for extra charge. Kids welcome, special rate for kids under 6. No minimum stay for Columbus Day weekend. Check availability The powderhound is located in the heart of Central vermont, in the scenic mad river Valley. with easy access from many eastern Locales, sugarbush and the powderhound are Ideal destinations for a long weekend get- Away or an extended vacation. enjoy skiing In the winter and fishing in the summertime. Our century-old converted farmhouse looks Over a peaceful, rustic setting at the Entrance to the sugarbush resort area. enjoy A walk on our spacious grounds, and watch the Birds, too. we make our guest feel right at Home. and do not forget, we welcome pets, too For a small additional fee. Amenities: * Golf * Phone Service * Parking * Television with Cable * No Smoking Rooms/Facilities * Pool * Skiing * VCR * Kitchen * Outdoor Pool * TV * Tennis

properties.name: Reception: The Inn at the Round Barn Farm
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing    1661 East Warren Road Waitsfield, Vermont 056733-night minimum Columbus Day weekend. 802-496-2276 There are also rooms to rent at the Round Barn Inn, prices ranging from 65-90. The food here is supposed to be fantastic. It\'s going to be a lot of fun. I heard there\'s going to be contra dancing. No pets. Children over 15.

properties.name: Sugar Lodge (39-69)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  2197 Sugarbush Access Rd, Warren, VT3-night minimum Columbus Day weekend. 800.982.3465 / 802.583.3300 Check availability It will be too cold for the outdoor pool, but the hot tub is open year \'round. amenities: The Sugar Lodge provides the essentials for your Vermont vacation. In the warmer months, you can take a dip in the outdoor pool and enjoy the scenery of the Green Mountains surrounding you. The Lodge is fully air-conditioned for your comfort. In the winter, relax by the roaring fire in the Great Room. The outdoor hot tub and wine/beer bar offer year-round relaxation options. A complimentary continental breakfast buffet is served daily. Laundry facilities, ice machine, soda machine, and refrigerator are also available on-site for guests\' use. No pets. Children? Not clear: either free under 6 or not accepted under 6.

properties.name: Sugarbush Inn (30)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing     1840 Sugarbush Access Rd, warren, VTPhone: (800) 53-SUGAR or (802) 583-6300 Fax: (802) 583-6303 Three-night minimun columbus Day weekend Kid-friendly Check availability From the website: Experience the charm and hospitality of a Country inn. whether you prefer a relaxing Evening reading in the wood paneled library Or a chat by the sitting rom fireplace- we Look forward to showing you our hospitality. Our floor creak and our fires crackle-and We would not have it any other way. the Gracious rooms of the inn have king size Beds or two twin beds- private baths- Cable television and 24-hour front desk Service. Amenities: * 120 AC * Bath Tub * Copy Service * FAX * Gift Shop * Health Club * Phone Service * Parking * Shower * Air Conditioned * Breakfast * Handicapped Rooms/Facilities * Fire Alarm with Light * Golf * Lounge * Pool * Restaurant * TV * Babysitting/Child Services * Meal Plan - Continental * Family Plan * Free Parking * No Smoking Rooms/Facilities * Meeting/Banquet Facilities * Indoor Pool * Sauna * Television with Cable

properties.name: Sugarbush Village Condominiums (5-30)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   76 Sugarbush Village Dr, Warren, VTKid-friendly, cribs available No pets 800-451-4326 reservations@sugarbushvillage.com Check rates

properties.name: The Featherbed (9-50)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 5864 Main Street waitsfield, VT3-night minimum Columbus Day weekend. Children aged 10 an over are welcome. No pets. Check availability We offer ten spacious bedrooms, all named after the lovely women in our family. Seven rooms are located in the Featherbed Inn and include two suites that can accommodate a small family. In the romantic Cottage, adjacent the Inn, are three additional, spacious rooms. All rooms are individually decorated with a sprinkling of antiques and memorabilia and include warm, fluffy featherbed mattresses to assure a comfortable sleep. Innkeepers: Linda & Tom Gardner 5864 Main Street, Rte. 100 Waitsfield, VT 05673 Phone: 802-496-7151 Fax: 802-496-7933 E-mail: featherbedinn@madriver.com

properties.name: Tucker Hill Inn (59-79)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 65 Marble Hill Road, waitsfield, vt802-496-3983 or 800-543-7841 tuckerhill@tuckerhill.com Two Night Minimum on Weekends 3-night minimum Columbus Day weekend. Supervised children 6 years and older are most welcome. Chech availability This tranquil Vermont bed and breakfast on 14 acres of woodland is surrounded by stone walls, patios and colorful gardens. Just minutes from scenic Route 100, Sugarbush & Mad River Glen and forty-five minutes or less from Montpelier, Norwich University, Burlington, UVM and Lake Champlain, it is an idyllic central location for corporate meetings, a Vermont wedding, family reunions and year round weekend and romantic getaways for all generations.

properties.name: Wait Farm Motor Inn
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 4805 Main St, Waitsfield, VTThis place describes itself as "affordable and convenient." To prove that they are affordable they have stuck the word "Motor" into their name and filled their website with misplaced apostrophes. Check availability No rates given on website. Call or email to find out more. Phone: 802-496-2033 Toll Free: 800-887-2828 Fax: 802-496-2033 Email: waitfarm@madriver.com

properties.name: Weathertop Mountain Inn (69)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   755 Mill Brook Road Waitsfield, VT800-800-3625 or 802-496-4909 stay@weathertopmountaininn.com 3-night minimum Columbus Day weekend. Children 5 and over are welcome. Pet friendly. Check availability Our contemporary post & beam is set well off the road and is nestled among a forested hillside, manicured lawns, and lush perennial gardens - perfect for viewing the resident birds and wildlife. Guests can expect thoughtful amenities and warm, attentive service from the resident innkeepers. Eight individually decorated guest rooms feature private baths, all of the comforts of home & more. Relax in our Great Room, enjoy the Hot Tub & Sauna, or venture to the Game Room for a bit more excitement. Join us in our bright & airy Dining Room for hearty breakfasts and eclectic evening fare. amenities: hot tub, sauna, dining room, game room, gym, high-speed internet, ski storage

properties.name: West Hill House (60-15)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 1496 West Hill Road, Warren Vermont 056741-800-898-1427 innkeepers@westhillbb.com Check availability Three-night minimum stay Columbus Day weekend Two-night minimum stay weekends. Children over age 12 only. No pets. Breakfast included. Drive up the quiet country road to our beautiful West Hill House Bed &Breakfast, an historic 1850\'s farmhouse where we invite you to enjoy four glorious seasons for romance, relaxation and recreation. We\'re one mile from Sugarbush skiing, golfing and tennis resort and adjacent to its Robert Trent Jones, Sr. championship golf course. We\'re seven miles from Mad River Glen, America\'s only cooperatively owned major ski area. West Hill House B&B is just off the beaten path but close to restaurants, shopping, quaint villages, covered bridges, many opportunities for outdoor recreation and more for you to discover. We offer 8 unique guest rooms - all ensuite - and a delicious breakfast for our guests.

properties.name: White Horse Inn (2-9)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 999 German Flats Road Waitsfield, VT 056731-800-328-3260 The White Horse Inn is centrally located in the Mad River Valley at the entrance to Mt Ellen at Sugarbush. Each of our 26 individually decorated rooms have a private bath. Eight of our rooms include cable TV. We have a recreation room with pool table and ping-pong table. Our Great Room includes a large stone fireplace. All of our rates include a full breakfast daily. Contact us: The White Horse Inn P.O. Box 323 Waitsfield VT, 05673 Email: Whorse@accessvt.com Phone: 802-496-3260

properties.name: Wilder Farm Inn (25-35)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  1460 Main St, Waitsfield, VT(800) 496-8878 info@wilderfarminn.com We accept well-behaved children 10 years and older. Check availability We are a National Historical Society Registered and beautifully renovated 8 guestroom farmhouse with private baths. While staying with us, you will enjoy a fireside breakfast made with fresh local, organic ingredients featuring David Hartshorne\'s fruits, vegetables and maple syrup along with Donald Terry’s brown eggs and local farm-fresh milk. We also proudly serve Green Mountain Coffee and Liberty Teas - Vermont\'s best coffee and tea. Lounge outside with an afternoon snack. Enjoy our library and spacious common rooms. Then, when it just can\'t get any better, you will end your day on a comfy featherbed. Wi-Fi equipped and satellite TV.
